nodes.text: A Starshine Surprise was an intoxicating beverage, potent enough that it was recommended only for non-Humans and the most hardened of Human drinkers. It allegedly got its name because, after consuming it, drinkers would discover themselves lying flat on their backs, looking at the stars. For those with even stronger constitutions, more than one Starshine Surprise could be put in the same glass; two resulted in a Tatooine Sunburn, several in a Cassandra Sunrise.
